mapper.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT c.* FROM mishu.tb_company c WHERE 1=1
and c.`regis_address` like CONCAT(#{area},'%')
and
c.`range` like '%${zz}%'
order by length(c.`range`) desc

select c.com_id,c.com_name,c.org_code from tb_company c where c.com_id in
#{com.comId}
mapper.select:
SELECT cc.com_id,s.cert_no,s.cert_date,s.valid_date FROM (
) cc,mishu.tb_safety_certificate s WHERE s.com_name =cc.com_name

SELECT cc.com_id,b.runScope as comRange,b.registerStatus as subsist FROM (
) cc, mishu_next.cert_basic b WHERE b.registerNo = cc.org_code AND b.companyName = cc.com_name
mapper.sql: (case s.otherType when '0' then '公告' when '1' then '补充' when '2' then '答疑' when '3' then '流标' when '4' then '澄清' when '5' then '延期' when '6' then '更正公告' when '7' then '废标' when '8' then '终止' when '9' then '修改' when '10' then '控制价' when '11' then '资审结果' when '12' then '资格预审' when '13' then '入围' when '14' then '暂停' else '其他' end) as noticeType ,( case s.biddingType when '0' then '施工' when '2' then '监理' when '3' then '采购' when '1' then '设计' when '4' then '勘察' when '5' then '其他' else '其他' end) as projectType

SELECT DISTINCT s.id,s.title,s.opendate,s.type,s.source ,
,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(distinct dd.pbMode SEPARATOR ',') FROM mishu.zhaobiao_detail dd WHERE dd.snatchurlid =s.id ) zhaobiao_pbMode ,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(distinct dd.pbMode SEPARATOR ',') FROM mishu.zhongbiao_detail dd WHERE dd.snatchurlid =s.id ) zhongbiao_pbMode
,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(distinct dd.pbMode SEPARATOR ',') FROM mishu.${detailTable} dd WHERE dd.snatchurlid =s.id ) pbMode
,(SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(distinct zz.certificate SEPARATOR ',') FROM mishu.snatch_url_cert zz WHERE zz.contId =s.id ) certificate
and DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -${queryDays} DAY) < s.openDate order by s.openDate desc,s.edit desc,s.biddingType ASC,s.id desc

,(SELECT outdd.oneName from mishu.zhongbiao_detail outdd where outdd.id =(SELECT min(dd.id) FROM mishu.zhongbiao_detail dd WHERE dd.snatchurlid =s.id )) oneName ,(SELECT outdd.projSum from mishu.zhongbiao_detail outdd where outdd.id =(SELECT min(dd.id) FROM mishu.zhongbiao_detail dd WHERE dd.snatchurlid =s.id )) projSum
mapper.select: SELECT a.contId FROM mishu.snatch_url_cert a WHERE a.certificateUuid in ( SELECT cz.zhuuid FROM mishu.cert_zz cz join mishu.cert_src cs on cz.srcUuid=cs.uuid where cs.companyName=#{companyName} and zhuuid is not null )

WHERE s.isShow = 0
and s.biddingType =#{projectType}
and s.province =(select name_abbr from mishu.area ar where ar.name = #{province} and grade=0)
and s.city in(select name_abbr from mishu.area where display_name like '%${city}%')
AND s.title LIKE '%${search}%'
and (s.type =0 or s.type=2)
and s.type = #{type}

SELECT s.id,s.title,s.opendate,s.type , ,s.url,
concat(#{provName},IFNULL(concat('-',IFNULL(dl.projdq,aa.name)),''),IFNULL(concat('-',dl.projXs),'')) as projDq,dl.pbMode,dl.projSum,
dl.bmSite,dl.kbSite,dl.kbStaffAsk, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(zz.certificate SEPARATOR ',') FROM mishu.snatch_url_cert zz WHERE zz.contId =#{id} AND (zz.block = dl.block OR dl.block = '' OR dl.block is null) ) zzRank, dl.tbAssureEndDate, dl.tbAssureEndTime,dl.tbAssureSum,dl.bmEndDate,dl.bmEndTime,dl.bmSite, dl.tbEndDate as kbDate,dl.tbEndTime as kbTime,dl.kbSite,dl.kbStaffAsk,
dl.oneName,dl.oneOffer,dl.twoName,dl.twoOffer,dl.threeName,dl.threeOffer,
dl.block,
#{provName} as projDq,
sc.content
left join
${snatchurlcontent_tbn} sc
mishu.snatchurlcontent sc
on sc.snatchurlid=s.id
left join mishu.${detailTable} dl on dl.snatchurlid=s.id
left join mishu.area aa on aa.name_abbr=s.city and aa.grade=1 where s.type = #{type} and s.isshow=0 and s.id=#{id}
mapper.sql: select DISTINCT id from mishu.snatchurl join ((select re.nextid as reid from mishu.snatchrelation re where re.mainid=#{id}) union all (select mainid as reid from mishu.snatchrelation re where re.nextid=#{id})) rd on rd.reid=id WHERE isshow=0
mapper.select:
join (
) rd on rd.id=s.id WHERE s.isshow=0 order by s.id desc,s.openDate desc

SELECT count(c.com_id) from mishu.tb_company c where 1=1
and c.`regis_address` like CONCAT(#{area},'%')
and
c.`range` like '%${zz}%'
order by length(c.`range`) desc

SELECT (SELECT t2.display_name FROM mishu.`area` t2 WHERE t2.path = t1.`parent_id`) AS displayName FROM ${detailTable} t LEFT JOIN mishu.`area` t1 ON t.`projDq` = t1.`name` WHERE t.`snatchUrlId` = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT zz.contid,aa.title, (CASE aa.tbassureSum WHEN '' THEN 0 WHEN '/' THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(aa.tbassureSum,0) END) as tbassureSum, aa.opendate,(select count(1) from mishu.tb_company tc where tc.`range` regexp group_concat(DISTINCT replace(zz.certificateuuid,',','|') separator "|") and tc.bak_id is null) as companyCount ,aa.url,group_concat(DISTINCT replace(zz.certificateuuid,',','|') separator "|") as 'zzlist' ,aa.projectType,aa.source FROM mishu.snatch_url_cert zz, (select dd.tbAssureSum,( case s.biddingType when '0' then '施工' when '2' then '监理' when '3' then '采购' when '1' then '设计' when '4' then '勘察' when '5' then '其他' else '其他' end) as projectType,s.id,s.title,s.opendate,s.url,s.source from mishu.snatchurl s join mishu.zhaobiao_detail dd on dd.snatchurlid=s.id where opendate >=#{startDay} and opendate <=#{endDay} and s.type=0 order by opendate desc) aa where zz.contid=aa.id group by zz.contid
mapper.insert: insert INTO biaodaa_stat.notic_match_com_report( cont_id,title,tb_assure_sum, open_date,match_com_count, url,certificate_uuid, project_type,source, com_type,batchNum )values( #{contid}, #{title}, #{tbassureSum}, #{opendate}, #{companyCount}, #{url}, #{zzlist}, #{projectType}, #{source}, #{comType}, #{batchNum} )
